string.name: wp_infection_control_dateofbirth_label
string.context: Used to display the patient's date of birth. %1$@ is the patient's date of birth in medium date format, like 'May 16, 2019'

string.name: wp_infection_control_dateofbirth_accessibility_label
string.context: Used to display the patient's date of birth. %1$@ is the patient's date of birth in medium date format, like 'May 16, 2019'

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_status_row_collapsed_ax
string.context: Accessibility only message that indicates the extra details of a covid sub statuses (test result, screening, vaccine) are collapsed.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_status_row_expanded_ax
string.context: Accessibility only message that indicates the extra details of a covid sub statuses (test result, screening, vaccine) are expanded.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_test_status_unknown
string.context: Status displayed based on available test results, indicating that the patient has not yet been tested.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_test_status_unknown_subtext
string.context: Used to add additional context for the unknown test result status

resources.string: U heeft geen COVID-19-onderzoeken in het systeem.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_test_status_pending
string.context: Status displayed based on available test results, indicating that a test has been ordered but not yet resulted/released.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_test_status_pending_subtext
string.context: Used to add additional context for the pending test result status. %1$@ is the ordering provider of the test. %2$@ is the organization that ordered the test. %3$@ is the medium formatted date that the test was ordered, like 'May 16, 2019'.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_test_status_not_detected
string.context: Status displayed based on available test results, indicating that virus that causes COVID-19 has NOT been detected.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_test_status_detected
string.context: Status displayed based on available test results, indicating that virus that causes COVID-19 has been detected.

plurals.name: wp_infection_control_covid_test_status_daysago
plurals.context: Displayed below the status based on available test results to indicate how long ago a test was resulted. %1$@ is the number of days ago that the test was resulted, like '4

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_test_status_not_detected_subtext
string.context: Used to add additional context for the 'not detected' test result status. %1$@ is the organization that completed the test. %2$@ is the medium formatted date that the test was resulted, like 'May 16, 2019'.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_test_status_detected_subtext
string.context: Used to add additional context for the 'detected' test result status. %1$@ is the organization that completed the test. %2$@ is the medium formatted date that the test was resulted, like 'May 16, 2019'.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_test_not_detected
string.context: Status displayed for a past test result, indicating that virus that causes COVID-19 has NOT been detected.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_test_detected
string.context: Status displayed for a past test result, indicating that virus that causes COVID-19 has been detected.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_status_not_screened
string.context: Status displayed based on available questionnaire screenings, indicating that the patient has not answered a screening in the last 24 hrs.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_status_not_screened_subtext
string.context: Used to add additional context for the not-screened screening status.

resources.string: U heeft geen zelfbeoordelingen voor COVID-19 van de afgelopen 24 uur in het systeem.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_status_screened_no_score
string.context: Status displayed based on available questionnaire screenings, indicating that the patient has answered a screening in the last 24 hrs, and no score was returned

resources.string: Zelfbeoordeling afgerond - risico op infectie kon niet worden bepaald

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_status_screened_no_score_subtext
string.context: Used to add additional context for the screened-no score screening status.

resources.string: Neem contact op met uw zorgverlener om uw antwoorden te bespreken en het risico dat u momenteel COVID-19 heeft te bepalen.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_non_scored_nothing_reported
string.context: Status displayed based on available COVID-19 questionnaire screenings, indicating that the patient has answered a non-scoring screening in the last 24 hrs, and no symptoms or exposure was reported. 'Complete' means the questionnaire screening was answered.

resources.string: Zelfbeoordeling afgerond - geen symptomen of blootstelling gerapporteerd

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_non_scored_nothing_reported_subtext
string.context: Used to add additional context for the non-scored, nothing reported questionnaire screening status. 'Consult' means 'check with', and 'provider' refers to a health care provider (human).

resources.string: Blijf de aanbevelingen van de overheid met betrekking tot COVID-19 volgen en neem contact op met een medisch zorgverlener als u ernstige symptomen krijgt, zich zorgen maakt over blootstelling aan COVID-19, of andere zorgen over uw gezondheid heeft.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_non_scored_symptoms_reported
string.context: Status displayed based on available questionnaire screenings, indicating that the patient has answered a non-scoring screening in the last 24 hrs, and symptoms were reported. 'Complete' means the questionnaire screening was answered.

resources.string: Zelfbeoordeling afgerond - één of meer symptomen gerapporteerd

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_non_scored_symptoms_reported_subtext
string.context: Used to add additional context for the non-scored, symptoms reported screening status. %1$@ is an emergency phone number. 'Consult' means 'check with', and 'provider' refers to a health care provider (human).

resources.string: Blijf uw symptomen in de gaten houden. Neem contact op met uw zorgverlener als u zich zorgen maakt over uw symptomen. Bel %1$@ als uw symptomen ernstig zijn of worden.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_non_scored_exposure_reported
string.context: Status displayed based on available COVID-19 questionnaire screenings, indicating that the patient has answered a non-scoring screening in the last 24 hrs, and exposure was reported. 'Complete' means the questionnaire screening was answered.

resources.string: Zelfbeoordeling afgerond - blootstelling aan COVID-19 gerapporteerd

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_non_scored_exposure_reported_subtext
string.context: Used to add additional context for the non-scored, exposure reported screening status. %1$@ is an emergency phone number. 'Consult' means 'check with', and 'provider' refers to a health care provider (human).

resources.string: Neem contact op met uw zorgverlener als u zich zorgen maakt over uw blootstelling aan COVID-19. Bel %1$@ als u ernstige symptomen krijgt.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_non_scored_symptoms_and_exposure_reported
string.context: Status displayed based on available COVID-19 questionnaire screenings, indicating that the patient has answered a non-scoring screening in the last 24 hrs, and both symptoms and exposure was reported. 'Complete' means the questionnaire screening was answered.

resources.string: Zelfbeoordeling afgerond - één of meer symptomen en blootstelling aan COVID-19 gerapporteerd

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_non_scored_symptoms_and_exposure_reported_subtext
string.context: Used to add additional context for the non-scored, both symptoms and exposure reported screening status. %1$@ is an emergency phone number. 'Consult' means 'check with', and 'provider' refers to a health care provider (human).

resources.string: Blijf uw symptomen in de gaten houden. Neem contact op met uw zorgverlener als u zich zorgen maakt over uw symptomen of blootstelling aan COVID-19. Bel %1$@ als uw symptomen ernstig zijn of worden.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_non_scored_no_risk_questions
string.context: Status displayed based on available COVID-19 questionnaire screenings, indicating that the patient has answered a non-scoring screening in the last 24 hrs that didn't have any risk questions. 'Complete' means the questionnaire screening was answered.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_non_scored_no_risk_questions_subtext
string.context: Used to add additional context for the non-scored, no risk questions screening status. %1$@ is the name of the header for resource links ('Helpful Resources' in English)

resources.string: Blijf een mondkapje dragen en doe aan social distancing. Bekijk de sectie %1$@ voor meer informatie over COVID-19.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_status_screened_high_risk
string.context: Status displayed based on available questionnaire screenings, indicating that the patient has answered a screening in the last 24 hrs, and the patient has high risk.

resources.string: Zelfbeoordeling afgerond - hoog risico op infectie

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_status_screened_low_risk
string.context: Status displayed based on available questionnaire screenings, indicating that the patient has answered a screening in the last 24 hrs, and the patient has low risk.

resources.string: Zelfbeoordeling afgerond - laag risico op infectie

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_status_screened_positive_test
string.context: Status displayed based on available questionnaire screenings, indicating that the patient has answered a screening in the last 24 hrs, and the patient indicated they have had a positive test.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_status_screened_positive_test_subtext
string.context: Used to add additional context for the 'positive test reported' screening status.

resources.string: Uw recentste zelfbeoordeling heeft een positieve COVID-19-onderzoeksuitslag gerapporteerd.

plurals.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_status_screened_hours_ago
plurals.context: Displayed next to the status based on available questionnaire screenings to indicate how long ago a screening was completed. %1$@ is the number of hours ago that the questionnaire was completed, like '4

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_status_screened_zero_hours_ago
string.context: Displayed next to the status based on available questionnaire screenings to indicate that a screening was completed less than an hour ago.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_screening_status_screened_action_label
string.context: Button text that links the user to a new screening questionnaire

resources.string: Een nieuwe zelfbeoordeling voor COVID-19 starten

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_screening_high_risk
string.context: Status displayed for a past questionnaire screening, indicating that the screening determined the patient had high risk.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_screening_low_risk
string.context: Status displayed for a past questionnaire screening, indicating that the screening determined the patient had low risk.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_screening_positive_test
string.context: Status displayed for a past questionnaire screening, indicating that the patient reported they had a positive test in their screening.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_screening_no_score
string.context: Status displayed for a past questionnaire screening, indicating that the screening was not able to determine a risk for the patient.

resources.string: Risico op infectie kon niet worden bepaald

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_screening_non_scored_nothing_reported
string.context: Status displayed for a past non-scored questionnaire screening, indicating that the patient didn't report symptoms or exposure.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_screening_non_scored_symptoms_reported
string.context: Status displayed for a past non-scored questionnaire screening, indicating that the patient reported symptoms.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_screening_non_scored_exposure_reported
string.context: Status displayed for a past non-scored questionnaire screening, indicating that the patient reported exposure.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_screening_non_scored_symptoms_and_exposure_reported
string.context: Status displayed for a past non-scored questionnaire screening, indicating that the patient reported symptoms and exposure.

resources.string: Eén of meer symptomen en blootstelling aan COVID-19 gerapporteerd

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_screening_non_scored_no_risk_questions
string.context: Status displayed for a past non-scored questionnaire screening that did not have any risk questions. 'Complete' means the questionnaire screening was answered.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_not_started
string.context: Status displayed based on administered vaccines, indicating that the patient has not had any.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_not_started_subtext
string.context: Subtext displayed based on administered vaccines, indicating that the patient has not had any.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_in_progress
string.context: Status displayed based on administered vaccines, indicating that the patient has had some but not all required doses. %1$@ is the number of doses received. %2$@ is the total number of doses required.

plurals.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_in_progress_no_req_doses
plurals.context: Status displayed based on administered vaccines, indicating that the patient has had some but not all required doses, and we don't know the number of required doses. %1$@ is the number of doses received.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_unknown
string.context: Status displayed based on administered vaccines, indicating that the patient's status is unknown.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_unknown_subtext
string.context: Subtext displayed based on administered vaccines, indicating that the patient's status is unknown.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_completed
string.context: Status displayed based on administered vaccines, indicating that the patient has had all required doses. %1$@ is the number of doses received. %2$@ is the number of doses required

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_in_progress_subtitle_two_doses
string.context: Subtitle displayed based on administered vaccines, indicating that the patient has their second and final dose upcoming. %1$@ is the date the vaccine dose is due in medium date format, like 'Dec 10, 2020'

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_in_progress_subtitle
string.context: Subtitle displayed based on administered vaccines, indicating that the patient has an upcoming dose due. %1$@ is the number of the dose. %2$@ is the date the vaccine is due in medium date format, like 'Dec 10, 2020'

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_incomplete_banner_text
string.context: Warning banner text shown when a patient may have received one or more invalid vaccines on file, to explain why we're not showing any doses received. Provider in this context is a person.

resources.string: De informatie over uw COVID-19-vaccin is mogelijk niet compleet. Neem contact op met uw zorgorganisatie voor meer informatie.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_dose_subtext_dose_date
string.context: Part of subtext shown for an administered vaccine dose, which contains dose number and date information. %1$@ is the number of the dose (dose 1 is their first shot, etc). %2$@ is the medium formatted date that the vaccine was received, like 'Dec 16, 2019'

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_dose_subtext_dose_date_without_dose_number
string.context: Part of subtext shown for an administered vaccine dose, which contains date information. %1$@ is the medium formatted date that the vaccine was received, like 'Dec 16, 2019'

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_dose_subtext_name_label
string.context: Part of subtext shown for an administered vaccine dose, which contains the label for name and dose information.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_dose_subtext_manufacturer_label
string.context: Part of subtext shown for an administered vaccine dose, which contains the label for vaccine manufacturer.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_dose_subtext_lot_label
string.context: Part of subtext shown for an administered vaccine dose, which contains the label for the vaccine lot number.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_dose_subtext_location_label
string.context: Part of subtext shown for an administered vaccine dose, which contains the label for the location the vaccine was administered.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_vaccine_status_dose_subtext_givenby_label
string.context: Part of subtext shown for an administered vaccine dose, which contains the label for the provider that administered the vaccine.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_view_history_link
string.context: Link that takes the user to a view of their historical statuses (past test results).

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_results_header
string.context: Header shown before the list of historical test results.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_results_notice
string.context: Message shown after the list of historical results, indicating that not all results are included.

resources.string: Alleen uw vijf recentste COVID-19-onderzoeken worden getoond.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_results_view_all
string.context: Link shown after the list of historical results, which takes the user to the test result list.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_screenings_header
string.context: Header shown before the list of historical questionnaire screenings.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_hx_screenings_notice
string.context: Message shown after the list of historical questionnaire screenings, indicating that not all screenings are included.

resources.string: Alleen uw vijf recentste COVID-19-zelfbeoordelingen worden getoond. Zelfbeoordelingen zijn van de afgelopen twee weken.

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_links_header
string.context: Used as a header for a list of links related to COVID-19

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_link_failed
string.context: Message shown when a link fails to launch

string.name: wp_infection_control_covid_link_external_ax_notice
string.context: Accessibility only text that lets the user know that a link opens outside of the app.

string.name: wp_infection_control_information_from
string.context: Title for happy together pop up about where your covid status information is coming from.

string.name: wp_infection_control_download_record_button_text
string.context: Text for the button to download a PDF record of the vaccination information

string.name: wp_infection_control_download_record_in_progress
string.context: Text for the button indicating to the user that the vaccination record download is in progress

string.name: wp_infection_control_download_taking_long
string.context: Message shown to the user that the vaccination record download is taking long, and they should try later.

resources.string: Het genereren van uw record duurt langer dan verwacht. Probeer het later nogmaals.

string.name: wp_infection_control_download_failed
string.context: Message shown to the user that the vaccination record download failed, and they should try later.

resources.string: Het downloaden van uw record is mislukt. Probeer het later nogmaals.
